net.sf.wubiq.utils

Class PrintServiceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.wubiq.utils.PrintServiceUtils

  • public class PrintServiceUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility for querying print service information.
    Author:
    Federico Alcantara

      • getServiceProviders

        public static java.util.List<javax.print.PrintServiceLookup> getServiceProviders()
        Gets the list of possible service providers.
        Returns:
        Service providers. Never null.

      • refreshServices

        public static void refreshServices()
        Tries to refresh print services.

      • getPrintServices

        public static javax.print.PrintService[] getPrintServices()
        Returns an array of printers supporting PDF flavor.
        Returns:
        Array of print services. If no services is found the return value is JVM implementation dependent.

      • getPrintServices

        public static javax.print.PrintService[] getPrintServices(java.lang.String group,
                                                          boolean includeLocals,
                                                          boolean includeNonGrouped)
        Gets print services belonging to a given group and optionally the locals print services and the non grouped print services.
        Parameters:
        group - Group to look for. Null or empty group will result in return non grouped print services.
        includeLocals - If true also local print services will be returned.
        includeNonGrouped - If true also adds the non grouped print services. This parameter has no use if group is given empty or null.
        Returns:
        An array containing the selected print services.

      • replacePrintService

        public static javax.print.PrintService replacePrintService(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                                           RemotePrintService newPrintService)
        Replaces a print service from its corresponding lookup with a new one.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to replace.
        newPrintService - New print service to add to the list.
        Returns:
        The print service just added.

      • findPrinter

        public static javax.print.PrintService findPrinter(java.lang.String name)
        Based on its name find corresponding printer.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the printer.
        Returns:
        A PrinterService or null.

      • findPrinter

        public static javax.print.PrintService findPrinter(java.lang.String name,
                                                   java.lang.String uuid)
        Based on its name and uuid finds a printer.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the printer.
        uuid - Unique remote id.
        Returns:
        A PrinterService or null;

      • findPrinterOrDefault

        public static javax.print.PrintService findPrinterOrDefault(java.lang.String name)
        Based on its name find corresponding printer. If not found returns the default printservice.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the printer.
        Returns:
        A PrinterService or null.

      • findCopies

        public static javax.print.attribute.standard.Copies findCopies(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                                               java.lang.Integer copiesCount)
        Return an instance of Copies attribute. If copies are not supported a null value is returned.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to be asked.
        copiesCount - copies count.
        Returns:
        a Copies instance or null.

                                                                   java.lang.Integer numberUpCount)
        Return an instance of NumberUp attribute. If numberUp are not supported a null value is returned.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to be asked.
        numberUpCount - numberUp count.
        Returns:
        a NumberUp instance or null.

        public static javax.print.attribute.Attribute findAttribute(javax.print.PrintService printService,

                                                            java.lang.String attributeName)
        Given the attribute name returns its equivalent Attribute instance.
        Parameters:

        attributeName - Attribute name.
        Returns:
        Attribute name or null if not found or not supported for the print service.

      • getCategories

        public static java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends javax.print.attribute.Attribute>> getCategories(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Given a PrintService (printer) returns its supported categories.
        Parameters:
        printService - Printer to be sought.
        Returns:
        a Collection of supported categories, could be empty, never null.

      • isAttributeCategorySupported

        public static boolean isAttributeCategorySupported(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                                   java.lang.Class<? extends javax.print.attribute.Attribute> category)
        Determines if the category is supported by the printer.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service, if null the category is assumed to be unsupported.
        category - category to be tested.
        Returns:
        True if the category is supported.

      • getCategoryAttributes

        public static java.util.Collection<javax.print.attribute.Attribute> getCategoryAttributes(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                                                                          java.lang.Class<? extends javax.print.attribute.Attribute> category)
        Finds the supported attributes for pdfFlavor for the combination printService, category.
        Parameters:
        printService - printService to be sought.
        category - category as filter.
        Returns:
        a Collection of PresentationDirection attributes. Can be empty, never null.

      • isRemotePrintService

        public static boolean isRemotePrintService(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Returns true if print service is an instance of RemotePrintService. However keep in mind that PrintService and RemotePrintService might be loaded by different class loader thus not being registered as the same instance.
        Parameters:
        printService - PrintService to test.
        Returns:
        True if the service is an instance of RemotePrintService.

      • isMobilePrintService

        public static boolean isMobilePrintService(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Returns true if print service is a Mobile Remote print service. However keep in mind that PrintService and RemotePrintService might be loaded by different class loader thus not being registered as the same instance.
        Parameters:
        printService - PrintService to test.
        Returns:
        True if the service is an instance of RemotePrintService.

        Serialize print service categories.
        Parameters:

        debugMode - if true all errors are logged out.
        Returns:
        Serialize print service categories.

      • supportDocFlavor

        public static boolean supportDocFlavor(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                       javax.print.DocFlavor docFlavor)
        Determines if a print service supports the given doc flavor.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print Service to test about.
        docFlavor - Doc flavor to test.
        Returns:
        True if the print service support the flavor. False otherwise.

      • isSameVersion

        public static boolean isSameVersion(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Returns true if the print service has the same version as the server.
        Parameters:
        printService -
        Returns:
        True if the print service represents a local print service or if the remote print service is the same as the server version.

      • getClientVersion

        public static java.lang.String getClientVersion(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Gets the client version that is connecting to.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to poll.
        Returns:
        Client version or <2.0.

      • clientSupportsCompression

        public static boolean clientSupportsCompression(javax.print.PrintService printService)
        Indicates if the client supports compression.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to test.
        Returns:
        True if the client supports version, false otherwise.

      • convertedVersion

        public static int convertedVersion(java.lang.String version)
        Converts a version to a numeric value for comparison purposes.
        Parameters:
        version - Version string to compare. Format version.sub-version[.build]
        for example: 2.0.10 = 2000010, 2.1 = 2001000, 2.1.1 = 2001001
        Returns:
        A representation of the convertedVersion.

      • findMedia

        public static javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaSizeName findMedia(float width,
                                                                     float height,
                                                                     int units)
        Finds a suitable media size name. If it can't find an exact match then it CREATES and register a new set of MediaSizeName and MediaSize. It allows landscape dimensions.
        Parameters:
        width - Width of the paper.
        height - Height of the paper.
        units - Units used. It can be MM or INCH.
        Returns:
        Compatible MediaSizeName, never null.

      • getMediaPrintableArea

        public static javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaPrintableArea getMediaPrintableArea(javax.print.PrintService printService,
                                                                                      javax.print.DocFlavor flavor,
                                                                                      javax.print.attribute.standard.MediaSizeName media)
        Tries to produce a compatible printable area.
        Parameters:
        printService - Print service to check the printable area from.
        flavor - Doc flavor to use. It can be null.
        media - MediaSizeName to check the contraints. If null returns the default MediaPrintableArea for the printer.
        Returns:
        MediaPrintableArea or null.
